maqras.text: ara niscaya amara sasti'i yantranadayaka sasti
ara taderake baluna, ibarahimera atithidera katha
yakhana tara tara kache upasthita haye balala, ‘salama’, takhana tini balalena, niscaya amara tomadera byapare sankita
Tara balala, ‘bhaya karabena na, amara apanake eka jnani putrera susambada dicchi [1].’
Tini balalena, ‘tomara ki amake susambada diccha ami brd'dha ha'oya sattbe'o? Tomara kisera susambada diccha [1]?’
Tara balala, ‘amara satya susambada dicchi; kaje'i apani hatasa habena na.’
Tini balalena, ‘yara pathabhrasta tara chara ara ke tara rabera anugraha theke hatasa haya?’
Tini balalena, ‘he prerita (pheresata) gana! Tomadera ara bisesa ki uddesya ache?’
Tara balala, ‘niscaya amaderake eka aparadhi sampradayera kache pathano hayeche
tabe lutera paribarera birud'dhe naya [1], amara to abasya'i tadera saba'ike raksa karaba
kintu tamra strike naya; amara sthira karechi ye, niscaya se pichane abasthanakaridera'i antarbhukta.’
Atahpara pheresatagana yakhana luta paribarera kache asala
takhana luta balalena, ‘tomara to aparicita loka’
Tara balala, ‘na, tara ye bisaye sandigdha chila amara apanara kache ta’i niye esechi
ara amara apanara kache satya sambada niye esechi ebam abasya'i amara satyabadi

kaje'i apani ratera kono eka samaye apanara paribarabargake niye beriye paruna ebam apani tadera pichane caluna [1]. Ara tomadera madhye ke'u yena pichane na takaya [2]; tomaderake yekhane yete bala hayeche tomara sekhane cale ya'o [3].’
Ara amara take e bisaye phayasala janiye dilama ye, niscaya taderake bhore samule binasa kara habe
Ara nagarabasi ullasita haye upasthita hala
Tini balalena, niscaya era amara atithi; kaje'i tomara amake be'iyayata karo na
Ara tomara allah‌ra taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amake heya karo na.’
Tara balala, amara ki duniyasud'dha lokake asraya dite tomake nisedha karini
luta balalena, ekanta'i yadi tomara kichu karate ca'o tabe amara e kan'yara rayeche
Apanara jibana [1], niscaya tara tadera nesaya bibhranta haye ghurachila
Atahpara suryodayera samaya prakanda citkara taderake pakara'o karala
tate amara janapadake ultiye upara-nica kare dilama ebam tadera upara poramatira pathara-kankara barsana karalama
Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche paryabeksana-saktisampanna byaktidera jan'ya
Ara niscaya ta loka calacalera pathera pase'i bidyamana
Niscaya ete muminadera jan'ya rayeche nidarsana
Ara ‘a'ika’basira [1]o to chilo simalanghanakari
atahpara amara tadera theke pratisodha nilama, ara e janapada du’ti'i prakasya pathera pase abasthita
Ara abasya'i hijarabasira [1] rasulera prati mithya aropa karechila
amara taderake amadera nidarsana diyechilama, kintu tara ta upeksa karechila
Ara tara pahara kete ghara nirmana karato nirapade
Atahpara bhore bikata citkara taderake pakara'o karala
Kaje'i tara ya arjana karata ta tadera kona kaje aseni
Ara asamana, yamina o tadera majhe abasthita kono kichu'i yatharthata chara srsti karini [1] ebam niscaya kiyamata asabe'i. Kaje'i apani parama saujan'yera sathe oderake ksama karuna
Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i mahasrasta, mahajnani
Ara amara to apanake diyechi punah punah pathita satati ayata o mahana kura'ana

Amara tadera bibhinna srenike bhoga- bilasera ye upakarana diyechi tara prati apani kakhano apanara ducokha prasarita karabena na [1]. Tadera jan'ya apani duhkha karabena na [2]; apani muminadera jan'ya apanara bahu nata karuna
ebam baluna, ‘niscaya ami'i prakasya satarkakari.’
Yebhabe amara nayila karechilama bibhaktakaridera upara
yara kura'anake bibhinnabhabe bibhakta kareche
Kaje'i sapatha apanara rabera! Abasya'i amara tadera saba'ike prasna karaba'i
se bisaye, ya tara amala karata
Ata'eba apani ye bisaye adesaprapta hayechena ta prakasye pracara karuna ebam musarikadera theke mukha phiriye nina
Niscaya amara bidrupakaridera birud'dhe apanara jan'ya yathesta
yara allah‌ra sathe an'ya ilaha nirdharana kare. Kaje'i sighra'i tara janate parabe
Ara abasya'i amara jani, tara ya bale tate apanara antara sankucita haya
kaje'i apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam apani sajadakaridera antarbhukta hona
Ara apanara mrtyu asa paryanta apani apanara rabera ibadata karuna
